data.name: Artificial Selection
data.detailed_description:
Join our Discord


About the Game

Saeva, a socially anxious teenager, finds himself trapped in a building along with 13 other young adults. They are all accused of being criminals and are told the only way to escape is by proving their worth and potential for improvement.

Saeva is fairly confident he's innocent, but can the same be said about everyone else?


Artificial Selection is a mystery visual novel with escape game/puzzle sequences. Be prepared to do a lot of clicking and potentially use your brain.




  • Dive deep into the psychology and philosophy of 14 different (supposed) criminals! What led them to do what they did?
  • Solve escape room puzzles! Build a sense of solidarity with the other participants by overcoming various tasks together. (For visual novel-purists, there is an option that lets you skip the most challenging puzzles.)
  • Prove your debate skills! The majority decides who gets left behind, so it's up to you to convince them who that is. Change the tides of a debate by strategically attacking or defending the right opponents.
  • Make use of the flow chart! Rather than juggling countless save files, see which choices and endings you're missing at a single glance. This makes completing every route as straightforward as possible.

data.short_description: Fourteen young adults find themselves trapped in a building, all accused of being criminals. The only way to escape is by proving their worth and potential for improvement. Discover the motives of the other participants and judge who gets to live or die.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit only)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This game touches upon topics that may be upsetting for some people, including but not limited to: Political violence, mental trauma, and death.
